TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkClickedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks A指定中按下此連結的文字。A specifies the text of the link that is clicked in the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#541](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#541)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#541](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#541)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的文字`linkText`參數可以是 URL、 檔案路徑或其他資料，您要指定給所按的連結。The text specified in the `linkText` parameter can be a URL, file path, or other data that you want specified for the link being clicked.

span.span: Gets the text of the link being clicked.

value.span: 控制項中所按的連結文字。

span.span: The text of the link that is clicked in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的文字可能是檔案、 URL 或按下的連結所指定的其他資料。The text returned by this property could be a file, URL, or other data specified by the link that is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
